ValidationRule.description: BIZ-45061:When user other than the one having permission 'ADDRESS_ADMIN_OVERRIDE' tries to update any field on the address when Status is verified then trow error. BIZ-49280
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( $Permission.Operations_User), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Verification Approved'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Verification Approved'),OR( ISCHANGED( Account__c ),ISCHANGED( Address__City__s ),ISCHANGED( Address__CountryCode__s ), ISCHANGED( Address__Street__s ),ISCHANGED( Address__StateCode__s ),ISCHANGED( Address__PostalCode__s ),ISCHANGED( Department__c ),ISCHANGED(Name),ISCHANGED( Status__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For updating the record, please create a Task for Contract Ops by clicking 'Update Address' button
